TextBlock.Text: ADONSONIA: If you’re reading this, that means that you solved my signal puzzle. Well done!
ADONSONIA: If you’re wondering about the requirement that I sent to Oryza, then don’t worry, it’s just that we need to have two different planets with some sand on them.
ADONSONIA: Also, for the record, Daucus totally helped me set up this little prank. Turns out the price to hack all of the planets to have harmonic signals is nothing more than a few sap-treats.
